property.name: Rules
property.value: When Acclaimed Contender enters the battlefield, if you control another Knight, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Knight, Aura, Equipment, or legendary artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A faerie's glee at her trove quickly fades to contentment, then to boredom, then to an urge to steal more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything white.) Creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Adamant - If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, Ardenvale Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even when hope is but a small flame fighting the night, I will serve the absent king."

property.name: Rules
Flavor
Rules
property.value: When Bartered Cow dies or when you discard it, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the market, no one heeded Hilda's frantic mooing. The fae curse was turning out even worse than she had feared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink Beloved Princess can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes a gentle slipper can travel where an armored boot's been denied.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Charming Prince enters the battlefield, choose one - • Scry 2. • You gain 3 life. • Exile another target creature you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Knight you control. Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a legendary spell, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. {3}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player can't cast more than one noncreature spell each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They have forsaken their vows. The edict of the Circle demands their voices be silenced." - Syr Tasdale, knight of Ardenvale

property.name: Rules
Flavor
Rules
property.value: As long as you control an artifact or enchantment, Flutterfox has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fox grinned. ‘How about a bet, dragon? If I win, the skies are mine.' After he stopped laughing, the dragon agreed." - Tales of the Fae

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +0/+1. When Fortifying Provisions enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To the king, to the Circle, and to the realm! And to not dying."

property.name: Rules
Flavor
Rules
property.value: When Glass Casket enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with mana value 3 or less until Glass Casket leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fate will decide whether it's a bed or a tomb.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Happily Ever After enters the battlefield, each player gains 5 life and draws a card. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are five colors among permanents you control, there are six or more card types among permanents you control and/or cards in your graveyard, and your life total is greater than or equal to your starting life total, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Non-Archon creatures have base power and toughness 3/3. When Harmonious Archon enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, lifelink Creatures entering the battlefield or dying don't cause abilities to trigger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's begin this conversation again, and this time you will only listen."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What good is loyalty to the crown if we are not also in service to those less fortunate? I fight for all of us."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever a white creature you control attacks, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Until my last breath, I will defend the realm."

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Flying Each creature you control that has an Adventure enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. (It doesn't need to have gone on the adventure first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For good or ill, most fae can't resist meddling in the adventures of any knight they meet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Outflank deals damage to target attacking or blocking creature equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With the drum of hooves and a flash of blades, the monster's terrifying roar changed to a cry of fear." - Legend of the Gilded Knights

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wrote these tales with a quill made from a griffin's feather. And the winning of that feather is quite a tale itself." - Chulane, Teller of Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens. Adamant - If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you're as loyal as you claim, now is the time to show it." - Queen Linden of Ardenvale

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Syr Damon looked at the dragon and saw the faces of every innocent it had devoured. Suddenly, his sword blazed like the sun.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tempered by fire and united in virtue, the knights of Ardenvale fight with a single, unbreakable will.

Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.value: "The realm must never yield to the chaos of the wilds."

property.value: Enchant creature without flying Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At least up here I have some peace and quiet."

property.value: Exile target artifact or enchantment. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful, dear. Some people deserve their curses." - Marawen, barrow witch

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Venerable Knight dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target Knight you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May this blade guide you on your great journey, as it did me on mine."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Knight spell, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every Ardenvale aspirant must step through the flame. Their honor determines whether they burn or shine.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the wilds, your true training will begin." - Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw

property.value: When Corridor Monitor enters the battlefield, untap target artifact or creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Castle Vantress has no locks on its doors, but interlopers rarely make it past the foyer.

property.value: Counter target spell. Its controller mills three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you're in our home, we expect you to mind your manners."

You may reveal a noncreature card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

property.value: Flash Flying Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Faerie Vandal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: History may be written by the triumphant, but it's often rewritten by the troublesome.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players have no maximum hand size. {X}{X}, {T}: Each player draws X cards. {2}{U}, {T}: Each opponent mills cards equal to the number of cards in their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a blue Frog creature with base power and toughness 1/1. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: That gnat was still hovering by the venison, and now both looked delicious.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gadwick, the Wizened enters the battlefield, draw X cards. Whenever you cast a blue spell, tap target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His name is spoken only in whispers - but he hears just the same.

Rules
property.value: This spell costs {3} less to cast if an opponent has seven or more cards in their graveyard. Draw four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The boundary between real and imaginary is as thin as the page, and just as easily torn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. You have no maximum hand size. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a knowledge counter on The Magic Mirror, then draw a card for each knowledge counter on The Magic Mirror.

property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+2. Whenever you draw your second card each turn, attach Mantle of Tides to target creature you control. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U}. {2}{U}: Put an hour counter on Midnight Clock. At the beginning of each upkeep, put an hour counter on Midnight Clock. When the twelfth hour counter is put on Midnight Clock, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. Exile Midnight Clock.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Mirrormade enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Share your darkest secret and the Mirror will reveal your soul's essence." - Ceri, royal mirrorkeeper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Mistford River Turtle attacks, another target attacking non-Human creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fae raised the turtle from a tiny hatchling. They taught it whom to ferry - and whom to drown.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Moonlit Scavengers enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact or enchantment, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They comb the shallows of Lochmere for relics of a bygone era. And if they happen upon a lone traveler, all the better.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a blue spell. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Poor, lost mage. Your feet are on land, yet you're in over your head, aren't you?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes the hardest choice is between two wonders." - Gadwick, the Wizened

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Overwhelmed Apprentice enters the battlefield, each opponent mills two cards. Then you scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

Rules
property.value: Choose two target creatures controlled by different players. Return those creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Virtue is virtue, whatever the heart that nurtures it." - Malacan, Vantress exile

property.value: Whenever Sage of the Falls or another non-Human creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ask a merfolk even a simple question and the answer is a journey far beyond the known.

property.value: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-0. It gets -6/-0 instead as long as its controller has seven or more cards in their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His sword sounded like a silver chime on the glass jar, and the sprite laughed with delight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Steelgaze Griffin gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If we didn't guard our secrets, they wouldn't remain secrets for long." - Gadwick, the Wizened

property.value: Return target creature with mana value X to its owner's hand. You create X 1/1 blue Faerie creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Denizens of the wilds don't always seek to harm intruders. Sometimes they simply misplace them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Tome Raider enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Humans are so forgetful. Every page I steal becomes a secret they can't remember."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Draw a card. Adamant - If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.value: Draw three cards. Adamant - If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, scry 3.

property.value: Rowan and Will exchanged a baffled glance. Could the stag in the vision lead them to their father?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Vantress Gargoyle can't attack unless defending player has seven or more cards in their graveyard. Vantress Gargoyle can't block unless you have four or more cards in hand. {T}: Each player mills a card.

property.value: Flying Adamant - If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, Vantress Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Someone knows where the king is. They can't expect to keep it a secret from us."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {1}{U}: Wishful Merfolk loses defender and becomes a Human until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She yearned to walk on dry land so she might take her vengeance there.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was built by the Witch of Lochmere. Most of the wishes it grants are its own.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mourning shifts seamlessly to celebration as she chooses her next suitor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My secret ingredient? Well, I can't tell you that. But here's a hint. It's not love."

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Locthwain knights take pride in being the last ones standing in a fight or on a dance floor.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Blacklances travel deep into the wilds, sometimes for years at a time, in search of the lost Cauldron of Eternity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every day the cat returns to kill the same mouse, which sinks again into the cauldron's brew.

property.value: The dragon had a lot of things going through his mind that day. He didn't expect a sword to be one of them.

property.value: "I will find the king if I have to ride from summer to winter and back again."

property.value: He has slain a dozen witches, luring each with a promise of fresh children's bones.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the wilds, the ravens steal far more than baubles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Oathsworn Knight enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Oathsworn Knight attacks each combat if able. If damage would be dealt to Oathsworn Knight while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rats you control have menace. {1}{B}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token. {2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice three Rats: Gain control of target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it has ears, it will dance to my tune."

property.value: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Into amethyst, I pour Envy's shadow, sorrow's gleam. Lure the one whose scorn I bore That I may hear one final scream." - Barrow witch incantation

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.value: Syr Tasdale declared that he never wanted to see the witch Ygretta again. Her familiars quickly granted his request.

property.value: "Imagine having your skeleton extracted through your ear, one bone at a time." - Corliss the Wanderer

(They each put the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

property.value: "Murder clad in crimson beauty, An end to life and love and duty." - Barrow witch incantation

property.value: When Wicked Guardian enters the battlefield, you may have it deal 2 damage to another creature you control. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some are born to greatness. You were born to scrub greatness's floors."

property.value: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.value: The hex swept through the village, its citizens falling one by one.

property.value: The giant had heard of locks, but he had yet to discover a door he couldn't open.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You think these walls will protect you? My, you have a dim view of the power of the wilds." - Marawen, barrow witch

property.value: "For every scar I've received, I've given ten back."

property.value: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The deal was struck and the favor had been done. And so, under the cover of night, the debt was paid." - Tales of the Fae

property.value: "After the death of her mother, Cassia found that things that appear fragile can be very strong indeed." - Beyond the Great Henge

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The king would die for the realm. I would not hesitate to do the same for him."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking non-Human creatures you control get +1/+0 and have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knights who excel in tournaments sometimes underestimate threats beyond the realm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You can cast spells only during your turn and you can cast no more than two spells each turn. You may cast spells with mana value less than or equal to the number of lands you control without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just tell us how many you want and get out of the way."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Giants believe that tossing redcaps at knights is the best way to deal with both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add seven {R}. You can cast only one more spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The greatest challenge isn't the stifling heat but the crushing weight of those who failed before.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Irencrag Pyromancer deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear of fire is a sensible instinct. If I were you, I'd be terrified."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. The creature you control gets +2/+1 until end of turn if it's a Knight. Then those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life is a tournament that rewards the bold." - Syr Layne, knight of Embereth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create two 1/1 black Rat creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gather round and tell me all from the courts and castles."

property.name: Rules
Flavor
Rules
property.value: Whenever Ogre Errant attacks, another target attacking Knight gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knights kept returning from Ogre's Pass wearing nothing but bruises, so they decided to just pretend it was on their side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Opportunistic Dragon enters the battlefield, choose target Human or artifact an opponent controls. For as long as Opportunistic Dragon remains on the battlefield, gain control of that permanent, it loses all abilities, and it can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many tales of redcap terror begin with two simple things: bloodlust and stolen steel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Redcap Melee deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If a nonred permanent is dealt damage this way, you sacrifice a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At first, Syr Fenwick scoffed when he saw his opponents for the final match.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Redcap Raiders attacks, you may tap an untapped non-Human creature you control. If you do, Redcap Raiders gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I admire their courage as much as I despise their savagery." - Syr Carah, the Bold

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Reach, haste Whenever Robber of the Rich attacks, if defending player has more cards in hand than you, exile the top card of their library. During any turn you attacked with a Rogue, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scorching Dragonfire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the blaze raced toward her, Syr Ameril closed her eyes and pictured Castle Ardenvale so her last thoughts would be of home.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Searing Barrage deals 5 damage to target creature. Adamant - If at least three red mana was spent to cast this spell, Searing Barrage deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It emerged from the coldest depths of Lochmere only to face the fires of Irencrag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Seven Dwarves gets +1/+1 for each other creature named Seven Dwarves you control. A deck can have up to seven cards named Seven Dwarves.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gleam of rubies and my brothers and sisters by my side . . . what more could I want?" - Brognold the Third

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Skullknocker Ogre deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random. If the player does, they draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ogre crashed through the massive door. The winged folios scattered like frightened birds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Slaying Fire deals 3 damage to any target. Adamant - If at least three red mana was spent to cast this spell, it deals 4 damage instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The purest virtue burns brighter than the sun and hotter than dragonfire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sundering Stroke deals 7 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets. If at least seven red mana was spent to cast this spell, instead Sundering Stroke deals 7 damage to each of those permanents and/or players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Syr Carah, the Bold or an instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. {T}: Syr Carah deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Duty and honor are reasons enough, but beating you will also be a pleasure."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember all the great heroes who were careful and never did anything risky? Me neither." - Syr Carah, the Bold

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a red source you control would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals that much damage plus 2 instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A dwarf's grudge runs deeper than the mountains' roots.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Weaselback Redcap gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would rather cast myself into the abyss than let my blood stain the cap of those monsters." - Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw

property.name: Rules
property.value: // Create a Food token. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile. A Food token is an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.name: Flavor
Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell that has an Adventure, draw a card. (It doesn't need to have gone on the adventure first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Warmth. Safety. A fully-stocked larder. You'll find nothing like Edgewall Keep in the wilds, I promise you that!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, trample When Feasting Troll King enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") Sacrifice three Foods: Return Feasting Troll King from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fell the Pheasant deals 5 damage to target creature with flying. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A keen eye and steady hand are essential for defeating most foes, including hunger." - Syr Grenphire, knight of Garenbrig

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Fierce Witchstalker enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While the realm has laws, in the wilds there are other ways of balancing power.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
Rules
property.value: // Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

property.name: Flavor
Rules
property.value: Adamant - If at least three green mana was spent to cast this spell, Garenbrig Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Garenbrig Paladin can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell that has an Adventure, Garenbrig Squire gets +1/+1 until end of turn. (It doesn't need to have gone on the adventure first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Find him a weapon as big as his dreams." - Yorvo, lord of Garenbrig

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may sacrifice two Foods. If you do, create a 7/7 green Giant creature token. Otherwise, create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They look tasty, but best to plant them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Gilded Goose enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {1}{G}, {T}: Create a Food token. {T}, Sacrifice a Food: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. {T}: Add {G}{G}. You gain 2 life. Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on it and draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may sacrifice a Food. If you do, target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn. Otherwise, that creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He ate them out of house and home and shed and barn and flock and herd.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more non-Human creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the lion knows more stories than I do." - Chulane, Teller of Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Kenrith's Transformation enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a green Elk creature with base power and toughness 3/3. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a Food: Target creature blocks Maraleaf Rider this turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {2} less to cast if an opponent controls a green permanent. Deathtouch Whenever Oakhame Adversary deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves remember every secret path from the days when they ruled the realm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Put up to one other target card from your graveyard on top of your library. Exile Once and Future. Adamant - If at least three green mana was spent to cast this spell, instead return those cards to your hand and exile Once and Future.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If this spell is the first spell you've cast this game, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control, then it fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.) Adamant - If at least three green mana was spent to cast this spell, the creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, deathtouch, haste Questing Beast can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Combat damage that would be dealt by creatures you control can't be prevented. Whenever Questing Beast deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to target planeswalker that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Draw cards equal to the greatest power among non-Human creatures you control. • Non-Human creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Long after the magic wore off, the mice still dreamed of glorious galloping." - Tales of the Fae

property.name: Rules
Flavor
Rules
property.value: When Rosethorn Halberd enters the battlefield, attach it to target non-Human creature you control. Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Equip {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After years of taunts and aerial assaults from Rankle's minions, the witches of Maraleaf Forest acquired new familiars.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Syr Faren, the Hengehammer attacks, another target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Syr Faren's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words are pointless. It's what you do with your hammer that counts."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, has reach, and is a Giant in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He realized a bit late that he was supposed to plant the magic beans.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Trail of Crumbs enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") Whenever you sacrifice a Food, you may pay {1}. If you do, look at the top two cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: // Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

property.name: Flavor
Artist
Rules
property.value: When Wicked Wolf enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature you don't control. Sacrifice a Food: Put a +1/+1 counter on Wicked Wolf. It gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Reach Whenever another non-Human creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {X}. When you do, put X +1/+1 counters on Wildborn Preserver.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Wildwood Tracker attacks or blocks, if you control another non-Human creature, Wildwood Tracker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This one was wearing shoes made of glass. She'll be no ordinary prey."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create three 1/1 green Boar creature tokens with "When this creature dies, create a Food token." (A Food token is an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The monster was gaining on them. Twice it had found them. There was only one place left to hide." - Tales of the Fae

property.name: Rules
property.value: Yorvo, Lord of Garenbrig enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Yorvo. Then if that creature's power is greater than Yorvo's power, put another +1/+1 counter on Yorvo.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to X target artifact and/or non-Aura enchantment cards each with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If X is 6 or more, those permanents are 4/4 creatures in addition to their other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a nonland, nontoken permanent. If that player can't, they discard a card, they lose 2 life, you draw a card, you gain 2 life, you create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance, then you sacrifice Doom Foretold.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the end, death usually has its way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard. • Destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top five cards of your library. You may play cards exiled this way until the end of your next turn. You may play an additional land this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The guards kindled the hearth and locked the door to Ellwen's chamber. By morning, the fire was out and Ellwen was gone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Faeburrow Elder gets +1/+1 for each color among permanents you control. {T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wide-reaching roots draw more than water.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Create two 2/2 black and green Wolf creature tokens with "When this creature dies, put a loyalty counter on each Garruk you control." −3: Destroy target creature. Draw a card. −6: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +3/+3 and have trample."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other non-Human creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Does it matter what it is? Take it and be grateful!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying. {4}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I agreed to light his way as long as he always had my back." - Squill, Mistford pixie

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fight for my daughter, who may not set foot on a battlefield for many years. Remember who you fight for."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash {U}, Sacrifice an Island: Lochmere Serpent can't be blocked this turn. {B}, Sacrifice a Swamp: You gain 1 life and draw a card. {U}{B}: Exile five target cards from an opponent's graveyard. Return Lochmere Serpent from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Neither hostile nor friendly, pixies flit through the forest seeking the treasures of the wilds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") [+1]: Target artifact or creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Elk creature with base power and toughness 3/3. −5: Exchange control of target artifact or creature you control and target creature an opponent controls with power 3 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one at random. Create a red and white creature token with those characteristics. • 3/1 Human Warrior with trample and haste. • 2/1 Human Cleric with lifelink and haste. • 1/2 Human Rogue with haste and "When this creature enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card. [+1]: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike and trample until end of turn. −8: Draw four cards. When you do, The Royal Scions deals damage to any target equal to the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Savvy Hunter attacks or blocks, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") Sacrifice two Foods: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: None of the other villagers dare venture into the wilds, so she feeds the whole hamlet herself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Shinechaser gets +1/+1 as long as you control an artifact. Shinechaser gets +1/+1 as long as you control an enchantment.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: "A traditional lance is fine for the Burning Yard, but in the wilds you need a nastier bite." - Kenver, Embereth weaponsmith

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws a card and loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As she reached the pinnacle, lightning flashed and her eyes blazed with newfound power." - Legend of the Gilded Knights

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell that has an Adventure, put a +1/+1 counter on Wandermare. (It doesn't need to have gone on the adventure first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A good steed will carry you home. A great steed will carry you to glory." - Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Wintermoor Commander's toughness is equal to the number of Knights you control. Whenever Wintermoor Commander attacks, another target Knight you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Arcanist's Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When you gain life for the first time each turn, return Deathless Knight from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Headed to the wilds? Beware the dead riders who serve the Shadow Queen." - Scalan, Edgewall innkeeper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) {BR}{BR}{BR}, Sacrifice another creature or an artifact: Elite Headhunter deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing remains of his foes but the gripping story of their downfall.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike {RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}: Fireborn Knight gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He endured the white-hot blaze of the Circle and the sweltering heat of the Irencrag, and he emerged victorious.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Loch Dragon enters the battlefield or attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite its ferocity, its favor can be won with a gift of something it's never seen before.

property.name: Color
Rules
Rules
property.value: Rampart Smasher can't be blocked by Knights or Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He has strength and courage - just way, way too much of both." - Syr Faren, the Hengehammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WB}{WB}: Resolute Rider gains lifelink until end of turn. {WB}{WB}{WB}: Resolute Rider gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Respect the wilds? Certainly. Fear them? No."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While humans hear only a deafening roar, the fae hear music of breathtaking beauty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Adamant - When Clockwork Servant enters the battlefield, if at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast it, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some are annoyed by the constant ticking as they clean the cobbles, but to the castle custodians, there's no sweeter sound.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Northern Beacon flared, and even before the drawbridge finished its descent, the knights charged out." - Legend of the Gilded Knights

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Enchanted Carriage enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Mouse creature tokens. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {1}: Gingerbrute can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with haste. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gingerbrute: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The unlabeled vial was not vanilla extract after all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Golden Egg enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Golden Egg: Add one mana of any color. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Golden Egg: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Adamant - If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, Henge Walker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everything that inhabits Garenbrig is affected by the wild magic flowing through the Great Henge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Heraldic Banner enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+0. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Inquisitive Puppet enters the battlefield, scry 1. Exile Inquisitive Puppet: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The strings were gone, but he still felt the pull of invisible forces tugging at his mind." - Beyond the Great Henge

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}: Jousting Dummy gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't let it fool you. Many of us got our first scars from Syr Nobody." - Syr Layne, knight of Embereth

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}: Locthwain Gargoyle gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the traitor hurried across the courtyard, its eyes snapped open. It was time to pay the queen a visit." - Beyond the Great Henge

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an Adventure instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Syr Branigan always remembered to kiss his good luck charm, having lost his foot to wolverines the last time he forgot.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prophet of the Peak enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It frequently predicts imminent death by devouring.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {7}: Roving Keep gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. It can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It wandered slowly across the landscape, calling out in its lonely voice, but no other castles answered its cries." - Beyond the Great Henge

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Scalding Cauldron: It deals 3 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a witch's trick, this cauldron full of pain. I wouldn't dump it on any but the wicked."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shambling Suit's power is equal to the number of artifacts and/or enchantments you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The young squire gripped her sword as the clanking stranger emerged. It was no knight that had come to challenge her." - Beyond the Great Henge

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {2}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Accursed scarecrow! Sending folk in every direction is the same as sending them nowhere at all." - Corliss the Wanderer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, you may pay {3}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of Sorcerer's Broom.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Reynald wished for an army to sweep away his enemies. The fae king smiled." - Beyond the Great Henge

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Sorcerous Spyglass enters the battlefield, look at an opponent's hand, then choose any card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {5}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though long forgotten, the wheel continued to turn, spinning fate from a dusty attic." - Beyond the Great Henge

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach, trample, protection from multicolored Stonecoil Serpent enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cast out of Garenbrig for his crimes, Ennor turned to fae magic to fashion the perfect weapon for his revenge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Weapon Rack enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from Weapon Rack onto target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No weapon stays on the rack for long in the Burning Yard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Create a Food token. If the sacrificed creature's toughness was 4 or greater, create two Food tokens instead. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wafting smells are both scrumptious and suspicious.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Castle Ardenvale enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains. {T}: Add {W}. {2}{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without Ardenvale's loyalty, the realm would greedily devour itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Castle Embereth enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain. {T}: Add {R}. {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without Embereth's courage, the realm would falter and fall.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Castle Garenbrig enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest. {T}: Add {G}. {2}{G}{G}, {T}: Add six {G}. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells or activate abilities of creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without Garenbrig's strength, the realm would succumb to the wilds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Castle Locthwain enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp. {T}: Add {B}. {1}{B}{B}, {T}: Draw a card, then you lose life equal to the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without Locthwain's persistence, the realm would stagnate and die.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Castle Vantress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island. {T}: Add {U}. {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Scry 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without Vantress's knowledge, the realm would lose itself in darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {R}.) Dwarven Mine enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Mountains. When Dwarven Mine enters the battlefield untapped, create a 1/1 red Dwarf creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Fabled Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From here, the path to anywhere may be found.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {G}.) Gingerbread Cabin enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Forests. When Gingerbread Cabin enters the battlefield untapped, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {W}.) Idyllic Grange enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Plains. When Idyllic Grange enters the battlefield untapped, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U}.) Mystic Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Islands. When Mystic Sanctuary enters the battlefield untapped, you may put target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}. Spend this mana only to cast a Knight or Equipment spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one knows when the tournament began. All they know is that it will never end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {B}.) Witch's Cottage enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Swamps. When Witch's Cottage enters the battlefield untapped, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: All creatures gain trample and haste until end of turn. {1}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {2}{W}: Target player gains 5 life. {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. {4}{B}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Up to one target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. −2: Rowan, Fearless Sparkmage deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn. −9: Gain control of all creatures until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Garrison Griffin attacks, target Knight you control gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The keen-eyed guardians of Ardenvale are ever on alert.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike As long as you control a Rowan planeswalker, Rowan's Battleguard gets +3/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This sword is Sunrise. The other is Dawn. They mark the beginning of my days but the end of yours."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rowan's Stalwarts enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Rowan, Fearless Sparkmage, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped. When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature you control. [0]: Until end of turn, Oko, the Trickster becomes a copy of target creature you control. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. −7: Until end of turn, each creature you control has base power and toughness 10/10 and gains trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They function as everything from assassins to jesters in the name of their fae king.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}: Bramblefort Fink has base power and toughness 10/10 until end of turn. Activate only if you control an Oko planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter the cruelty of Oko's jokes, he's always guaranteed the sycophant's laughter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Oko, the Trickster, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My advisors recommend I let them eat you." - Oko

property.name: Rules
property.value: Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped. When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Silverwing Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. Whenever Silverwing Squadron attacks, create a number of 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance equal to the number of opponents you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {3}{U}: Create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The throng flitted from castle to castle, leaving a trail of star-crossed love, damaging rumors, and missing heirlooms in their wake.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As long as you control four or more artifacts, Shimmer Dragon has hexproof. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The indigo dragon gladly traded a bit of its hoard for everlasting moonlight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifact creatures you control have flying. At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target noncreature artifact you control become a 0/0 artifact creature. If you do, put four +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear not what's under the bed. The toys are watching." - Beyond the Great Henge

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Chittering Witch enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 black Rat creature tokens equal to the number of opponents you have. {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player sacrifices three creatures. You create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hone the knife and mourn the least. Three chimes to sound the sweet, grim feast." - Barrow witch incantation

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, Embereth Skyblazer has flying. Whenever Embereth Skyblazer attacks, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, creatures you control get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of opponents you have.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We fight with valor in our hearts and fire in our veins!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Steelbane Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Steelbane Hydra: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many an ancient treasure has been reduced to jagged caltrops by its snapping jaws.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Thorn Mammoth or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Thorn Mammoth fights up to one target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It will come to the defense of all wild things, from the shivering wren to the towering giant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0. Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rankle's pranks are child's play. My games will topple kingdoms."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell from your hand, copy it if you control an artifact, then copy it if you control an enchantment. You may choose new targets for the copies. Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. You create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. {3}, {T}: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Gluttonous Troll enters the battlefield, create a number of Food tokens equal to the number of opponents you have. (Food tokens are artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {1}{G}, Sacrifice another nonland permanent: Gluttonous Troll gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Knight you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {6}{W}{B}, Sacrifice Knights' Charge: Return all Knight creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By hoof, wing, or paw. For the realm!" - Syr Gwyn, Hero of Ashvale

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Korvold, Fae-Cursed King enters the battlefield or attacks, sacrifice another permanent. Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Korvold and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Transformed at his own wedding, he promptly ate the banquet, the gifts, and the guests.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, menace Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. Equipment you control have equip Knight {0}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Squires throughout the realm aspire to her mix of panache and martial prowess.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tome of Legends enters the battlefield with a page counter on it. Whenever your commander enters the battlefield or attacks, put a page counter on Tome of Legends. {1}, {T}, Remove a page counter from Tome of Legends: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Approach my tower on bended knee or depart from it as ash upon the wind." - Gadwick, the Wizened

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rats you control have menace. {1}{B}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token. {2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice three Rats: Gain control of target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it has ears, it will dance to my tune."
